name: video-summary
description: Video Summary SDK is a powerful Node.js module for advanced video processing, offering features like speech-to-text transcription, content summarization, automatic chapter extraction, and comprehensive video summarization. It's perfect for developers looking to integrate video analysis into their projects. Example usage: const sdk = new VideoSummarySDK('your_api_key_here'); sdk.transcribe('https://s3.us-east-1.wasabisys.com/videosummary/test_files/demo.mp3', 'your_id_here').then(response => console.log(response)).catch(error => console.error(error));
author: VideoSummary.io
